trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for classes that enable the server to gather information about the capabilities of the browser that made the current request.
trans-unit.target: 作為類別的基底類別，這些類別可讓伺服器收集已發出目前要求之瀏覽器功能的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase> class is an abstract class that contains the same members as the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase>類別是抽象類別，其中包含相同的成員<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase> class enables you to create derived classes that are like the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> class, but that you can customize and that work outside the ASP.NET pipeline.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase>類別可讓您建立衍生的類別，它就像是<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>類別，但您可以自訂，且該工作外的 ASP.NET 管線。

trans-unit.source: When you perform unit testing, you typically use a derived class to implement members with customized behavior that fulfills the scenario you are testing.
trans-unit.target: 當您執行單元測試時，您通常會使用衍生的類別來實作自訂行為符合您要測試的案例中的成員。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesWrapper> class derives from the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesWrapper> 類別衍生自 <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesWrapper> class serves as a wrapper for the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesWrapper>類別可做為包裝函式<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>類別。

trans-unit.source: At run time, you typically use an instance of the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesWrapper> class to call members of the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> object.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段，您通常使用的執行個體<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesWrapper>類別來呼叫的成員<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化這個類別，以供繼承的類別執行個體使用。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式只能由繼承的類別呼叫。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the browser is capable of supporting ActiveX controls.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得表示瀏覽器是否能夠支援 Cookie 的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser can support ActiveX controls; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器可以支援 ActiveX 控制項，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the collection of available control adapters.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得可用的控制項配接器集合。

trans-unit.source: The registered control adapters for the browser.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器之已註冊的控制項配接器。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: The name of the browser to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的瀏覽器名稱。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, used internally to add an entry to the internal collection of browsers for which capabilities are recognized.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，在內部用來將項目加入已辨識其功能之瀏覽器的內部集合中。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the client is an America Online (AOL) browser.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中被覆寫時，取得值，指出用戶端是否為 America Online (AOL) 瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser is an AOL browser; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器是 AOL 瀏覽器，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports playing background sounds by using the <see langword="bgsounds" /> HTML element.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時取得值，這個值表示瀏覽器是否支援使用 <see langword="bgsounds" /> HTML 項目播放背景音效。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports playing background sounds; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器支援播放背景音效，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the browser is a beta version.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得指出瀏覽器是否為搶鮮版 (Beta) 的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser is a beta version; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器是搶鮮版 (Beta)，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the browser string (if any) that was sent by the browser in the <see langword="User-Agent" /> request header.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得瀏覽器在 <see langword="User-Agent" /> 要求標頭中送出的瀏覽器字串 (如果有的話)。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the <see langword="User-Agent" /> request header that was sent by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器已傳送的 <see langword="User-Agent" /> 要求標頭內容。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a collection of browsers for which capabilities are recognized.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得可識別其功能的瀏覽器集合。

trans-unit.source: The browsers for which capabilities are recognized.
trans-unit.target: 可識別其功能的瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports decks that contain multiple forms, such as separate cards.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得值，指出瀏覽器是否支援包含多個表單的 Deck，例如個別的卡片。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports decks that contain multiple forms; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器支援包含多個表單的 Deck，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the browser device is capable of initiating a voice call.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得表示瀏覽器裝置是否可初始化語音電話的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser device is capable of initiating a voice call; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器裝置可初始化語音電話，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports page content that follows WML <see langword="select" /> or <see langword="input" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時取得值，這個值表示瀏覽器是否支援 WML <see langword="select" /> 或 <see langword="input" /> 項目之後的網頁內容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports page content that follows HTML <see langword="select" /> or <see langword="input" /> elements; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果瀏覽器支援遵循 HTML 網頁內容<see langword="select" />或<see langword="input" />項目，否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports empty HTML <see langword="select" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時取得值，這個值表示瀏覽器是否支援空的 HTML <see langword="select" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports WML <see langword="input" /> and <see langword="select" /> elements together in the same card.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得指出瀏覽器是否同時支援同一張卡中的 WML <see langword="input" /> 和 <see langword="select" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports WML <see langword="input" /> and <see langword="select" /> elements together; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器同時支援 WML <see langword="input" /> 和 <see langword="select" /> 項目，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports WML <see langword="option" /> elements that specify both <see langword="onpick" /> and <see langword="value" /> attributes.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會取得值，指出瀏覽器是否支援同時指定 <see langword="onpick" /> 和 <see langword="value" /> 屬性的 WML <see langword="option" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports WML <see langword="option" /> elements that specify both <see langword="onpick" /> and <see langword="value" /> attributes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器支援同時指定 <see langword="onpick" /> 和 <see langword="value" /> 屬性的 WML <see langword="option" /> 項目，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports WML <see langword="onevent" /> and <see langword="prev" /> elements in the same card.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中被覆寫時，取得指出瀏覽器是否支援同一張卡中的 WML <see langword="onevent" /> 和 <see langword="prev" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports WML <see langword="onevent" /> and <see langword="prev" /> elements in the same WML card; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器支援同 WML 卡中的 WML <see langword="onevent" /> 和 <see langword="prev" /> 項目，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports WML cards for postback.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得值，指出瀏覽器是否支援 WML 卡進行回傳。

trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports WML <see langword="setvar" /> elements that have a <see langword="value" /> attribute of 0.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會取得值，指出瀏覽器是否支援 <see langword="value" /> 屬性為 0 的 WML <see langword="setvar" /> 項目。

trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器支援 <see langword="value" /> 屬性為 0 的 WML <see langword="setvar" /> 項目，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports sending email messages by using the HTML <see langword="mailto" /> scheme.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時取得值，指出瀏覽器是否支援使用 HTML <see langword="mailto" /> 配置來傳送電子郵件訊息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports sending email message by using the HTML <see langword="mailto" /> scheme; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 瀏覽器是否支援使用 HTML 傳送電子郵件訊息<see langword="mailto" />配置; 否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, used internally to get the defined capabilities of the browser.

trans-unit.source: The defined capabilities of the browser.

trans-unit.source: Always.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports Channel Definition Format (CDF) for webcasting.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得值，指出瀏覽器是否支援網路廣播之頻道定義格式 (CDF)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports CDF; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Always.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the version of the .NET Framework that is installed on the client.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得用戶端上安裝的 .NET Framework 版本。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime (CLR) version.
trans-unit.target: Common Language Runtime (CLR) 版本。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: The first filter to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: The second filter to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, used internally to compare filters.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，在內部用來比較篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: 1 if <paramref name="filter1" /> is a parent of <paramref name="filter2" />; -1 if <paramref name="filter2" /> is a parent of <paramref name="filter1" />; or 0 if there is no parent-child relationship between <paramref name="filter1" /> and <paramref name="filter2" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="filter1" /> 是 <paramref name="filter2" /> 的父代，則為 1；如果 <paramref name="filter2" /> 是 <paramref name="filter1" /> 的父代，則為 -1；如果 <paramref name="filter1" /> 和 <paramref name="filter2" /> 之間沒有任何父子式關聯性，則為 0。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the browser is capable of supporting cookies.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser can support cookies; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器能夠支援 Cookie，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether cookies are currently enabled in the browser, only whether the browser can support cookies.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會指出瀏覽器目前是否已啟用 Cookie，只會指出瀏覽器是否能夠支援 Cookie。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器在重新導向時支援 Cookie，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports the <see langword="multiple" /> attribute of HTML <see langword="select" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時取得值，這個值表示瀏覽器是否支援 HTML <see langword="multiple" /> 項目的 <see langword="select" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports the <see langword="multiple" /> attribute of HTML <see langword="select" /> elements; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器支援 HTML <see langword="true" /> 項目的 <see langword="multiple" /> 屬性，則為 <see langword="select" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether clearing a checked HTML <see langword="input type="checkbox"" /> element is reflected in postback data.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時取得值，這個值表示清除核取的 HTML <see langword="input type="checkbox"" /> 項目是否會反映在回傳資料中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if clearing a checked HTML <see langword="input type="checkbox"" /> element is reflected in postback data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果清除核取的 HTML <see langword="true" /> 項目會反映在回傳資料中，則為 <see langword="input type="checkbox"" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports receiving XML over HTTP.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得值，這個值表示瀏覽器是否支援透過 HTTP 接收 XML。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports receiving XML over HTTP; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器支援透過 HTTP 接收 XML，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports HTML <see langword="table" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時取得值，這個值表示瀏覽器是否支援 HTML <see langword="table" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports HTML <see langword="table" /> elements; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器支援 HTML <see langword="true" /> 項目，則為 <see langword="table" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, used internally to get the type of the object that is used to write tags for the browser.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，在內部使用，取得用來寫入瀏覽器標記的物件類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the object that is used to write tags for the browser.
trans-unit.target: 用來寫入瀏覽器標記的物件類型。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the name and major (integer) version number of the browser.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中被覆寫時，取得瀏覽器的名稱和主要 (整數) 版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: The name and major version number of the browser.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器的名稱和主要 (整數) 版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, used internally to get a value that indicates whether to use an optimized cache key.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，內部用來取得表示是否使用最佳化快取金鑰的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use an optimized cache key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示使用最佳化快取索引鍵，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports Visual Basic Scripting edition (VBScript).
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得指出瀏覽器是否支援 Visual Basic Scripting Edition (VBScript) 的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports VBScript; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器支援 VBScript，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether VBScript is currently enabled in the browser, only whether the browser can support VBScript.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會指出瀏覽器目前是否已啟用 VBScript，只會指出瀏覽器是否能夠支援 VBScript。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the full version number (integer and decimal) of the browser as a string.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得瀏覽器的完整版本號碼 (整數和小數) 並以字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The full version number of the browser as a string.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器的完整版本號碼並以字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the version of the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML Document Object Model (DOM) that the browser supports.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得該瀏覽器支援的全球資訊網協會 (W3C) XML 文件物件模型 (DOM) 版本。

trans-unit.source: The number of the W3C XML DOM version number that the browser supports.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器支援的 W3C XML DOM 版本編號。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the client is a Win16-based computer.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得指出用戶端是否為 Win16 電腦的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser is running on a Win16-based computer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器在 Win16 架構電腦執行，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always.
trans-unit.target: 永遠。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the client is a Win32-based computer.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得指出用戶端是否為 Win32 電腦的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the client is a Win32-based computer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用戶端是 Win32 電腦，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always.
